admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The First Structural Adjustment Loan
            will support the implementation of the Government's
            comprehensive structural adjustment program outlined in a
            Letter of Development Policy submitted to the Bank. The
            principal aim of the program is to restore a sustainable
            balance of payments position while maintaining the growth
            momentum of the economy. To achieve these medium-term
            objectives, specific action will be taken to: (i) promote
            agricultural growth and exports; (ii) increase the export
            orientation of industry by a reform of the industrial
            incentive structure; (iii) provide a basis for efficient
            energy development and utilization through the preparation
            of a comprehensive energy sector program; (iv) strengthen
            public sector resource mobilization efforts; and (v) foster
            the development of public resources efficiently and provide
            an environment conducive to structural adjustment.
